department.dept_long_name: Department of Germanic Languages and Literatures

course.title: Women's Voices in German Medieval Literature
course.description: This course examines female expression in literature from the German speaking area in the Middle Ages. We focus on both a thorough textual analysis and the history of textual transmission in secular and religious spheres.
course.notes: The course is conducted in German. No previous familiarity with German medieval literature is required or presumed. Readings in Middle High German with modern German and English translations.
